trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp"></xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove"></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown"> </xref>, og <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove"> </xref> hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event occurs when the user presses the mouse button while the pointer is over a control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>inntreffer når brukeren trykker museknappen under pekeren over en kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event occurs when the user releases the mouse button while the pointer remains over the control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>hendelsen oppstår når brukeren slipper museknappen mens pekeren er over kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove> event occurs when the user moves the mouse pointer over a control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>hendelsen oppstår når brukeren flytter pekeren over en kontroll.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove>

trans-unit.source: A MouseEventArgs specifies which mouse button is pressed, how many times the mouse button was pressed and released, the coordinates of the mouse, and the amount the mouse wheel moved.
trans-unit.target: En MouseEventArgs angir hvilken museknappen trykkes, hvor mange ganger museknappen ble valgt og frigitt, koordinatene til musen, og hvor musehjulet flyttes.

trans-unit.source: It is possible to receive a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event without a corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, if the user switches focus to another application before releasing the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Det er mulig å motta en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>hendelse uten en tilsvarende <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>, hvis brukeren bytter fokus til et annet program før museknappen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: These three events exist for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> classes.
trans-unit.target: Disse tre hendelsene finnes for den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost>, og <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon>klasser.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NotifyIcon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AxHost> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: For information about the event model, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hendelsen modellen, kan du se [hendelser](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> values that indicate which mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> verdier som angir hvilken museknappen ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: The number of times a mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Antall ganger en museknappen ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of a mouse click, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten for et museklikk i piksler.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of a mouse click, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten for et museklikk i piksler.

trans-unit.source: A signed count of the number of detents the wheel has rotated.
trans-unit.target: En signert antall antall detents hjulet har roteres.

trans-unit.source: Gets which mouse button was pressed.
trans-unit.target: Henter museknappen som ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseButtons"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of times the mouse button was pressed and released.
trans-unit.target: Henter hvor mange ganger museknappen ble trykket og frigitt.

trans-unit.source: Although the Windows interface defines standard mouse events as either single-clicks or double-clicks, individual applications can interpret a larger number of clicks as a single event.
trans-unit.target: Selv om Windows-grensesnittet definerer standard mouse hendelser som enten single-Klikk eller dobbeltklikker, individuelle programmer kan tolke flere Klikk som én hendelse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that contains the number of times the mouse button was pressed and released.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Int32>som inneholder antall ganger museknappen ble trykket og frigitt.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Gets a signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.
trans-unit.target: Henter en signert telling av antallet detents musehjulet har roteres, ganget med WHEEL_DELTA konstant.

trans-unit.source: A detent is one notch of the mouse wheel.
trans-unit.target: En sperrhake er ett hakk for musehjulet.

trans-unit.source: The mouse wheel combines the features of a wheel and a mouse button.
trans-unit.target: Musehjulet kombinerer funksjonene i hjul og en museknappen.

trans-unit.source: The wheel has discrete, evenly spaced notches.
trans-unit.target: Hjulet har diskret, avstand hakk.

trans-unit.source: When you rotate the wheel, a wheel message is sent as each notch is encountered.
trans-unit.target: Når du roterer hjulet, sendes en hjulet melding som hvert hakk oppstår.

trans-unit.source: One wheel notch, a detent, is defined by the windows constant WHEEL_DELTA, which is 120.
trans-unit.target: Én hjulet hakk, en sperrhake er definert av windows-konstanten WHEEL_DELTA, som er 120.

trans-unit.source: A positive value indicates that the wheel was rotated forward (away from the user); a negative value indicates that the wheel was rotated backward (toward the user).
trans-unit.target: En positiv verdi angir hjulet ble roteres Videresend (bort fra brukeren;) en negativ verdi angir hjulet ble roteres bakover (mot brukeren).

trans-unit.source: Currently, a value of 120 is the standard for one detent.
trans-unit.target: Verdien 120 er for øyeblikket standarden for én sperrhake.

trans-unit.source: If higher resolution mice are introduced, the definition of WHEEL_DELTA might become smaller.
trans-unit.target: Hvis høyere oppløsning mus introduseres, bli definisjonen av WHEEL_DELTA mindre.

trans-unit.source: Most applications should check for a positive or negative value rather than an aggregate total.
trans-unit.target: De fleste programmer skal se etter et positivet eller negativt verdien i stedet for en aggregatfunksjon sum.

trans-unit.source: A signed count of the number of detents the mouse wheel has rotated, multiplied by the WHEEL_DELTA constant.
trans-unit.target: Et signert antall antall detents musehjulet har roteres, multiplisert WHEEL_DELTA konstant.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of the mouse during the generating mouse event.
trans-unit.target: Henter plasseringen av musen under generering MouseMove-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the x- and y- mouse coordinates, in pixels, relative to the upper-left corner of the form.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> som inneholder x og y mus-koordinatene i piksler i forhold til det øvre venstre hjørnet formatet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the x-coordinate of the mouse during the generating mouse event.
trans-unit.target: Henter x-koordinaten for musen under generering MouseMove-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: Musen koordinatene varierer avhengig av hendelsen som som opprettes.

trans-unit.source: For example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen behandles, musen koordinaten verdiene er i forhold til koordinatene til kontrollen som hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse-coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte hendelser som er knyttet til dra og slipp operasjoner har tilknyttede musen-koordinaten verdier som er i forhold til nullpunktet for skjemaet eller skjermen kommer fra.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: X-koordinaten for musen i piksler.

trans-unit.source: Gets the y-coordinate of the mouse during the generating mouse event.
trans-unit.target: Henter y-koordinaten for musen under generering MouseMove-hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The mouse coordinates vary based on the event being raised.
trans-unit.target: Musen koordinatene varierer avhengig av hendelsen som som opprettes.

trans-unit.source: For example, when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled, the mouse coordinate values are relative to the coordinates of the control that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel når den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>hendelsen behandles, musen koordinaten verdiene er i forhold til koordinatene til kontrollen som hendelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Some events related to drag-and-drop operations have associated mouse coordinate values that are relative to the form origin or the screen origin.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte hendelser som er knyttet til dra og slipp operasjoner har tilknyttede musen koordinaten verdier som er i forhold til nullpunktet for skjemaet eller skjermen kommer fra.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the mouse, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Y-koordinaten for musen i piksler.
